details.title: Better UI
items: Updated skin previews in the trap selector to always use the currently equipped base (previously a beta feature)

details.title: Better Journal
items: Added 'Show Full Mice Images in Journal' option (previously a beta feature)

details.title: Better Maps
items: Updated styles

details.title: Better Mice
items: Added ability to use Cmd/Ctrl+C on King's Crowns pages to copy mouse crown data in Crown Tracker Spreadsheet format

details.title: Better Travel
items: Added toggle to sort locations by name in the Travel Window

details.title: Catch Rate Estimator & Minlucks
items: Updated calculations to account for Dragon's Might aura

details.title: Data Exporters
items: Added 'Mouse Stats by Crowns' exporter to export your crown data to the Crown Tracker Spreadsheet

details.title: Experiments / Beta Features
items: Added 'Memory Matching Game' experiment – find it in the 'Camp' menu dropdown once enabled
Removed 'Better Journal List: Link all items' experiment – now integrated into Better Journal
Removed 'Full Mice Images in Journal' experiment – now a regular Better Journal option
Removed 'Prestige Base in Skin Previews' experiment – now a core Better UI feature with full base support

details.title: Favorite Setups
items: Added ability to drag and drop setups to reorder them
Updated setup name generation to create names automatically based on selected components
Updated sidebar placement to consistently show in the same location
Updated styles

details.title: Fixes
items: Fixed issue where the Minotaur's horn was incorrectly visible in all Zokor districts

details.title: Location Dashboard
items: Added Draconic Depths dashboard
Fixed Floating Islands dashboard occasionally showing the wrong loot type
Fixed Seasonal Garden showing 0% Amp when entering Zugzwang Tower
Fixed dashboard data display for your current location

details.title: Location HUD: Labyrinth
items: Fixed suggested door functionality suggesting doors that do not match the clue type

details.title: Location HUD: Seasonal Garden
items: Fixed tooltip display issues
Updated styles

details.title: Location HUD: Zokor
items: Added Memory Matching minigame to the Zokor HUD
Updated HUD to show current stealth after boss defeat instead of 'Leader Beaten'
Updated styles

details.title: Location HUD: Zugzwang Tower
items: Updated styles

details.title: Location HUD: Folklore Forest Region
items: Fixed double-crafting bug for some ME items when using the quick-craft button

details.title: Ultimate Checkmark
items: Added new Draconic Depths items to the required item list

details.title: Other
items: Improved data caching and expiration handling
Fixed issue where some data was cached indefinitely
Minor performance improvements
